name: Barry Chiaro
description:
Barry Chiaro wakes up to find that the world has been invaded by demons. Everyone is on a bus heading to a safe zone, but will Barry make it in time before it leaves?

  • A short platformer made to simulate the experience of playing a game on a Nokia 3310!
  • Beautiful 1-bit pixel art, catchy monophonic music and an astounding 15 FPS
  • Switch between Light & Dark form. Absorb enemy attacks in Dark form to gain ammo in Light form. But be careful, you're vulnerable to attacks in Light form.

This game was created in a few days for the Nokia 3310 Jam.

CONTROLS

MOVEMENTLeft/Right KeyNumpad 4 / 6JUMPSpace BarNumpad 8ATTACKZNumpad 5TOGGLE FORMXNumpad 0

CREDITS
